explanation:
{{comic
| number    = 840
| date      = December 29, 2010
| title     = Serious
| image     = serious.png
| titletext = Not to be confused with Serious PuTTY, the Windows terminal client where everything is in Impact.
}}

==Explanation==
This comic is a play on words with the substance known as "{{w|Silly Putty}}", which is "silly" because it responds oddly to being handled. The comic implies that instead of silly describing the movement of the putty; it describes the emotion of the putty.

Serious Putty on the other hand, would not even like to be touched, because it would prevent it from doing whatever important task it needed to do.
As it says in the title text {{w|PuTTY}} is a Windows Terminal client. {{w|Impact (typeface)|Impact}} is a font that is distributed with Windows that is used in the vast majority of "{{w|internet meme|meme}}" image macros, such as {{w|lolcat}} pictures.

==Transcript==
:[Cueball is standing next to a table. There is a can on the table.]

:[The label on the can reads, "Serious Putty".]

:[Cueball is looking at the table again.]

:[He reaches out to touch the can. The can speaks.]
:Can: Don't touch me.
